VacuumdConfiguration.statement: DELETE FROM events WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT svclosteventid FROM outages WHERE svclosteventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT svcregainedeventid FROM outages WHERE svcregainedeventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT eventid FROM notifications WHERE eventid = events.eventid) AND eventtime < now() - interval '6 weeks';

trigger.name: selectWithCounter
trigger.statement: SELECT alarmid FROM alarms WHERE counter >= 2

action.name: clear
action.statement: UPDATE alarms SET severity=2 WHERE alarmid = ${alarmid}

action.name: clearProblems
action.statement: UPDATE alarms SET severity=2 WHERE alarmType=1 AND severity > 2 AND eventUei = ${clearUei} AND dpName = ${dpName} and nodeID = ${nodeID} and ipaddr = ${ipaddr} and serviceID = ${serviceID}

action.name: escalate
action.statement: UPDATE alarms SET severity = severity+1 WHERE alarmid = ${alarmid} and severity < 7 and alarmAckUser is null

action.name: delete
action.statement: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE nodeid = ${nodeid} and eventuei = ${eventuei}

action.name: deleteDayOldAlarms
action.statement: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE alarmAckUser IS NOT NULL AND lastEventTime < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
